inclusion.criterion: Able to speak, read and understand English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Residing in specific communities in Ontario, British Columbia or New Brunswick
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Planning to remain in area for next 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Experienced physical, sexual, and/or psychological abuse, including coercive control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planning to separate OR in the process of separating OR separated from an abusive partner in the previous 3 years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Has access to the internet, and a safe computer, tablet, or smart phone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Living outside of the selected study sites, or living in the area but planning to relocate within 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No experience of physical, sexual, or psychological abuse, including coercive control, from a current or former partner in the previous 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planning to stay with an abusive partner OR separated more than 3 years ago
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No access to the internet, or safe computer, tablet or smart phone
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No access to safe email and mailing address
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient experienced physical abuse from a current partner in the previous 12 months. She has access to the internet, a safe computer, and a safe email address.
